column7: passed away at havana health care at 12:05 a. m. on wednesday
column11: il to clifford and naomia (fletcher) mc. ginnis. mr. mc. ginnis is survived by one sister
column16: ed mc. ginnis of san jose
column19: il and will mc. ginnis of mason city
column20: il. he was preceded in death by his parents. mr. mc. ginnis was a former employee of c & im railroad. cremation rites have been accorded and no services are planned at this time. memorial contributions may be made to the american heart association. online memorial messages may be left for the family at www. hurleyfh. com. hurley funeral home in havana is in charge of arrangements.
